Name: Word Typing Game
About the game: Word Typing Game : Test yourself how fast you write words? Test your writing skills. Dominate yourself on the keyboard. Challenge your friends. The goal is to destroy by typing the words from above. Our game has single and multiplayer mode. In multiplayer mode you can compete with friends or random players. You can practice with single player mode. Our word typing game is constantly being developed. Have fun everybody.
